info.headline: Fire Warning issued March 18 at 10:46PM CDT by NWS Amarillo TX
info.description:
FRWAMA
THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN AMARILLO HAS ISSUED A FIRE WARNING AT THE REQUEST OF BORGER EMERGENCY MANAGER FOR SOUTHERN HUTCHINSON COUNTY ON THE WEST SIDE OF BORGER.
* AT 1045 PM CDT...A DANGEROUS WILDFIRE WAS LOCATED OVER WESTERN BORGER NORTH OF HIGHWAY 136...MOVING RAPIDLY EAST NORTHEAST AT 3 TO 5 MPH.
* AREAS IMPACTED...AREAS OF WESTERN BORGER NORTH OF 3RD STREET, INCLUDING THE ROCK CREEK, GATEWAY, AND GOLF COURSE ADDITIONS.
* ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...SMOKE AND FIRE WILL PRESENT A THREAT TO LIFE AND PROPERTY FOR RESIDENTIAL AREAS OF WESTERN BORGER NORTH OF 3RD STREET INCLUDING ROCK CREEK, GATEWAY, AND THE GOLF COURSE ADDITIONS. TEMPORARY REFUGE IS LOCATED AT THE CITY OF BORGER MUNICIPAL COURT AT 611 WEATHERLY STREET. MOST OF THE TOWN IS WITHOUT POWER.
info.instruction: BE PREPARED TO EVACUATE QUICKLY IF REQUESTED AND FOLLOW ALL SAFETY INSTRUCTIONS FROM LOCAL EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT OFFICIALS. DO NOT DRIVE INTO SMOKE.
